name: Square Titans
description:
You are an auditor with super sonic speed abilities. You will face off against living buildings which are causing "problems" in the world.

To defeat them, you must hit their weak spots. This will reveal their core. Some have multiple cores. When this happens, you will only have a few seconds to unleash a series of high speed attacks!

Music by Mnerva Audio Studios

[Developers Note] This is a game I challenged myself to make in just 1 week. If you found this enjoyable, please leave a comment and/or rating. I would love to hear your thoughts.
